titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Office of Senate Fair Employment Practices in Betty Johnson v. Office of Senate Fair Employment Practices, No. 94-6002 (Fed. Cir.).

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 2/9/1994--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Office of Senate Fair Employment Practices in the case of Betty Johnson v. Office of Senate Fair Employment Practices.
